style: Minimalist Vector, Gradient Mesh, Flat Design
template: An abstract corporate logo icon for [Subject], utilizing a [Dominant Color Palette] color scheme, conveying a [Conceptual Mood] aesthetic, and emphasizing [Geometric Shape Emphasis] forms. Minimalist vector art, characterized by clean lines and geometric precision. Incorporating gradient mesh and flat design principles, with a modern aesthetic, ideal for app icon or branding. Isolated on a solid pristine white background, presented in perfect orthographic view. Featuring clean-cut edges, crisp rendering, smooth Bezier curves, and absolutely no text or extraneous elements. Achieve ultra high definition, pixel-perfect resolution. Professional grade, production-ready, masterwork quality, an award-winning design. --ar 1:1 --stylize 750

variable_explanations.Subject: Define the core concept or idea you want the icon to represent (e.g., 'growth', 'connection', 'security', 'data cloud', 'innovation'). Be specific and descriptive to guide the AI effectively.
variable_explanations.Dominant Color Palette: Specify the primary colors you envision for the icon (e.g., 'cool blues and greens', 'warm oranges and reds', 'monochromatic grey', 'vibrant gradients', 'pastel rainbow'). This sets the overall mood and brand identity.
variable_explanations.Conceptual Mood: Describe the emotional or conceptual feeling you want the icon to evoke (e.g., 'dynamic', 'calm', 'innovative', 'secure', 'playful', 'authoritative', 'futuristic'). This influences the abstract forms and composition.
variable_explanations.Geometric Shape Emphasis: Indicate the predominant geometric forms or stylistic elements you'd like to see (e.g., 'circles and curves', 'sharp angles and lines', 'interlocking polygons', 'organic flowing shapes', 'stacked blocks', 'abstract neural patterns').

tips: For best results, be specific and descriptive in your `[Subject]` variable. Instead of 'tech', try 'data analytics' or 'secure network' to guide the AI more effectively.

Define your `[Dominant Color Palette]` clearly. Use descriptive terms like 'cool blues and muted greens' or 'vibrant oranges with subtle grey accents' to ensure the AI generates the desired color scheme.

The template automatically generates icons on a pristine white background with a perfect orthographic perspective, ensuring maximum versatility and a professional, isolated look suitable for any branding context.

Consider the `[Geometric Shape Emphasis]` carefully. This variable strongly influences the abstract form and feel of the icon, from 'sharp angles and linear forms' to 'soft curves and organic shapes', directly impacting the overall design language.
description: This template is expertly crafted to generate stunning, abstract corporate branding icons in a contemporary minimalist vector style for Veo 3.1. It leverages advanced gradient mesh and flat design techniques to produce visually striking, scalable graphics perfect for logos, app icons, and digital branding assets. The hardcoded technical parameters ensure professional-grade quality without requiring the user to understand complex prompt engineering, allowing focus solely on the creative vision.
instructions: Simply fill in the four bracketed variables `[Subject]`, `[Dominant Color Palette]`, `[Conceptual Mood]`, and `[Geometric Shape Emphasis]` with your desired content. The rest of the prompt is pre-optimized for generating high-quality abstract corporate branding icons. Be descriptive and imaginative with your inputs to achieve the best results!

feedback.TITLE QUALITY: Critique cannot be provided as the prompt package, including its title, was not supplied. Please provide the prompt package for evaluation.
feedback.TEMPLATE STRUCTURE: Critique cannot be provided as the prompt package, including its template structure, was not supplied. Without the template, I cannot assess variable marking, style descriptors, technical specifications, or consistency.
feedback.VARIABLE EXAMPLES: Critique cannot be provided as the prompt package, including its variable examples, was not supplied. Without examples, I cannot assess diversity, mix, or range.
feedback.COMMERCIAL VIABILITY: Critique cannot be provided as the prompt package was not supplied. Without the core content, I cannot identify clear use cases, suggest an appropriate price tier, or determine its unique value proposition.
feedback.DESCRIPTION QUALITY: Critique cannot be provided as the prompt package, including its description, was not supplied. Without a description, I cannot evaluate the hook, technical features, or specified use cases.

priority_improvements: The prompt package was not provided. Please supply the complete prompt package (title, template, variable examples, description, and any other relevant commercial details) for a proper evaluation.

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.
quality_checklist: Style Consistency: Does the style remain consistent?
Composition: Does the output match your compositional expectations?
Visual Quality: Is the output high-quality?
Variable Impact: Does changing variables produce meaningful differences?

commercial_description:
Unlock a universe of sophisticated, on-brand corporate icons with unparalleled ease.

*   Achieve a cohesive, professional aesthetic across all your designs, effortlessly maintaining brand integrity.
*   Generate sleek, modern abstract icons with studio-quality lighting and depth, all at the click of a button.
*   Adaptable to any industry or brand message, providing a diverse range of sophisticated abstract concepts without complex adjustments.

Perfect for entrepreneurs, marketing professionals, graphic designers, or anyone needing elegant, impactful visual assets for brand identity, presentations, websites, and internal communications.

Experience the future of design: simply input your desired concept and watch as breathtaking, professional-grade abstract icons materialize, no design expertise required.
